conversations.body_text: Hi，Richard Pugh，  与 ProX 相比，Pro X Ultra 采用更厚的不锈钢材质，抗弯曲能力更强。其主控制器也进行了升级，支持 VAM Pro 线性电机，而 ProX 仅支持标准 VAM。

Hi Richard Pugh,  Compared to the ProX, the Pro X Ultra features thicker stainless steel for greater resistance to bending. Its main controller has also been upgraded to support the VAM Pro linear motor, whereas the ProX only supports the standard VAM.

Thanks for the update,

Are there any discounts available for purchasing the pro x ultra pedals and the vam linear motors

Im looking for a 2 pedal set brake and throttle, with a linear motor on each pedal,

Also is there a tuning spring kit available to allow for a different brake pedal  feel

I am currently unable to use my sim gear as my current pedals have broken due to a snapped component on the brake.. so would like to place an order as soon as possible dependant on pricing ofcourse.

Thanks
